profile.name: Hi, i'm Sebastián.
profile.description: As a student of Programming Analyst, I am actively seeking opportunities for my professional internship, with a specific interest in the backend and fullstack areas. I consider myself a responsible, organized individual with a proactive mindset and a strong willingness to learn and grow both professionally and personally.
profile.description2: My goal is to leverage my experience in mechanical engineering alongside my programming skills to contribute innovative and efficient solutions.  I am dedicated to continuous learning and enthusiastic about taking on new challenges that allow me to expand my knowledge and skills.
profile.description3: I have basic knowledge in different technologies, and I am complementing my studies with courses on Udemy while i finish my degree.
profile.info2: Python or Java. In addition, I am willing to work in languages that I do not know, with the aim of learning and acquiring new knowledge.
profile.info3: I'm interested in learning about the Full Stack or Backend area

study_projects.title: APP Inglés
study_projects.info1: Own project, created with html, css and javascript to learn and practice the basic functionalities of these languages, and reinforce English.
study_projects.info2: The project is a web application created using different technologies. Its main objective is to provide a tool to improve and practice knowledge of English, focusing on learning verbs in different conjugations.

study_projects.title: Shopping Cart
study_projects.info1: Institute project, developed as part of the Front-End course using HTML, CSS and JS with LocalStorage.
study_projects.info2: A functional shopping cart application has been developed using LocalStorage. In addition, the understanding of key concepts in web development and the importance of an interactive and user-friendly interface have been strengthened.

study_projects.title: Appointment management
study_projects.info1: Institute project, developed as part of the Back-End course using HTML, CSS, Django and PostreSQL upload to Render.
study_projects.info2: A functional automotive appointment management application has been developed. With different interfaces (Customer, Receptionist and Administrator) where you can manage vehicles and maintenance appointments.

study_projects.title: API Car Details
study_projects.info1: Personal project developed to understand the syntax of the MERN stack (Mongo, Express, React with Bootstrap, and Node).
study_projects.info2: It's a simple API to save information about car details with brands, models and years.
